snippet: Two numerals in the year of the Edward I. Koch’s birth have been transposed on his tombstone; instead of Dec. 12, 1924, the engraver carved 1942.
abstract: Two numerals in birth year on the tombstone of Edward I Koch, to be placed after his burial at Trinity Church Cemetery in Washington Heights, are transposed, making his birth year 1942 instead of 1924; engraver has promised to correct error within three weeks.
lead_paragraph: Two numerals in the year of the Edward I. Koch’s birth have been transposed on his tombstone; instead of Dec. 12, 1924, the engraver carved 1942.

headline.main: Incorrect Date of Koch’s Birth on Tombstone
headline.print_headline: Incorrect Date Of Koch’s Birth On Tombstone
